scripts.html: cp header.html index.html && pandoc --no-highlight -t html5 -f markdown_github-hard_line_breaks+yaml_metadata_block+markdown_in_html_blocks+auto_identifiers README.md | sed 's/\\&/\&/g' >> index.html && npx mjpage < index.html > tmp && mv tmp index.html && npm run notebook
scripts.test: npm run build && python3 -m "nose" -v && npm run notebook
scripts.pypi: rm dist/* && python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel && python3 setup.py sdist bdist_wheel && twine upload dist/* --skip-existing
